alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 901 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Maxbass to 9 miles west of Upham. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newburg around 910 PM CDT. Upham around 915 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Souris, Bottineau and Lake Metigoshe State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
